q: . The influential Club for Growth has beefed up his political team, and traveled to both Iowa and New Hampshire. Mike Pence sent this message to supporters on his political e-mail list this afternoon: Friends and Supporters, Over the past few months, my family and I have been grateful for the encouragement we have received to consider other opportunities to serve our state and our nation in the years ahead. We have been especially humbled by the confidence and support of those who believe we should pursue the presidency, but after much deliberation and prayer, we believe our calling is closer to home.

spark for Detroit after a slow start, winning his first game since joining the Pistons, 100-92 over the Sacramento Martin Luther King on Tuesday night. "It was a huge lift off of me," Allen Iverson said. I knew it would happen. You think every game you go out and play it's going to happen. It feels good. I wanted to get the monkey off my back. I'm just excited that I got my first win and I can now try to get a lot more. Tayshaun Prince added 26 points and 11 rebounds for the Pistons, who had lost their first two games since acquiring Allen Iverson from Denver last week for All-Star point guard Chauncey Billups , key reserve Antonio McDyess and Cheikh Samb . American Civil Liberties Union has uncovered thousands of pages of government documents that show that torture was authorized at the highest levels of the Bush administration. Jameel Jaffer , Deputy Legal Director of the ACLU: Mr. Donald Rumsfeld 's claim that the abuse at Abu Ghraib was isolated and aberrational is demonstrably false. Government documents show that the methods used at Abu Ghraib were the same ones Mr. Donald Rumsfeld approved, and that the abuse of prisoners in Defense Department custody was systemic. If there's any "known known,' it"s that Donald Rumsfeld joined with other officials to orchestrate a program of torture. This effort to rewrite history is shameful.
